name: Rule & Reference Cards for STA
description:
Recently while i've been playing in several 4E games, I was reminded how easy cards made playing quickly while remembering all my options. I also noticed how, often, my players would not engage with a full range of their abilities, often only taking specific actions when I suggested it, and sticking to very simple resource (Momentum/Determination) Spends. 

I wanted to Upgrade that.

Currently 41 cards, more will likely get added as I run into things that need to be updated, and I'm more than happy to hear suggestions!

These Cards were made using this Card Generator here. With the files are the .json's so that you can modify or add your own to the Deck with ease to make up for House Rules or as players customize your cards to include talents and the like
